item.title: Dark Mode on Qutebrowser
item.description: Catatan kali ini berisikian bagaimana mengaktifkan dark mode dibrowser qutebrowser, tanpa panjang lebar langsung saja buka config.py di folder ~/.config/Qutebrowser/ dan masukan settingan berikut : c.colors.webpage.darkmode.enabled = True c.colors.webpage.darkmode.algorithm = 'lightness-cielab' c.colors.webpage.darkmode.grayscale.all = True c.colors.webpage.darkmode.grayscale.images = 0.5 c.colors.webpage.darkmode.policy.images = 'never' c.colors.webpage.darkmode.policy.page = 'smart'
